name: VoiceOS
long_description:
Hiring at scale is broken. 

Our solution: Voice AI that instantly interview every applicant — holds lifelike conversations powered by the latest speech-synthesis breakthroughs, and scores each response against specific hiring criteria. Recruiters see only a curated shortlist as VoiceOS fine-tunes the agent’s questions over time. 

The payoff: days-to-hire instead of weeks, slashed overhead, and a recruiting engine that scales as fast as the enterprise — we’re poised to make it the new global standard for conversational hiring.
